name: Split the Spoils
description:
Welcome to our game,

How to play:

Use WASD/ARROWs to Move

Try and find the treasure chest as quickly as possible but watch out for traps!

If someone sees you they will want to join you in the treasure hunt. This will make your flashlight bigger to look out for traps, but it comes with a cost! The more people in your party the more gold you have to split in the end. So choose wisely!

Thanks for Playing!

Credits: (Made in 3 Hours  for Trijam205)

Art By: Logan Bertin

Programmer: Tyler McMillan

Music: Finn Talisker Music
